content.text: If you’ve not already seen it, check out the RPA’s Annual Report and Accounts for 22-23 ‘Supporting the Rural Economy'.
The report covers our performance as an Agency, a financial review, a sustainability report as well as highlights of the year.

From stories about RPA colleagues who go the extra mile, our partnership approach to farm visits and some amazing growth programme case studies, to the improvements we rolled out in various different areas, our outreach and volunteering work and collaboration with farming welfare organisations.
We hope you enjoy reading this insight into the Rural Payments Agency.
